record.title: Worth the investment
record.review_text: This standing desk is built like a tank. Super stable, quiet motor, and the cable management is thoughtful. Been using it daily for 3 months with zero issues. If you're on the fence, just do it. Your body will thank you.

errors.msg: Value error, review_id cannot be empty

record.title: My back thanks me
record.review_text: Spent weeks researching ergonomic chairs and this one ticks all the boxes. Lumbar support is adjustable, arm rests move in every direction, and the mesh back keeps me cool. Assembly took about 45 minutes but instructions were clear. Expensive but you get what you pay for.

record.title: Amazing sound quality!
record.review_text: I've been using this bluetooth speaker for a month now and I'm blown away by the sound quality. The bass is deep and the highs are crystal clear. Battery life is exactly as advertised - I get a solid 10 hours on a single charge. Highly recommend!
record.response_response_text: Thank you for your wonderful review! We're thrilled you're enjoying the sound quality. Rock on! 🎵

record.title: DONT BUY!!!
record.review_text: SCAM! The monitor arrived BROKEN. Screen was cracked. Box looked fine so it was packaged broken. AVOID!!! Customer service was unhelpful. Still waiting for refund after 3 WEEKS!!!
record.response_response_text: We take this very seriously. Our records show your refund was processed on March 10th. Please check with your bank. If you still don't see it, call us at 1-800-TECHSTOR and ask for a manager directly. We want to resolve this.

errors.msg: Input should be greater than or equal to 1

record.title: Exceeded expectations
record.review_text: Ordered this on a whim and it turned out to be one of my best purchases. Quality is outstanding and it looks even better in person than in the photos. Fast shipping too!

record.title: Disappointed with battery
record.review_text: The sound is okay but the battery life is nowhere near 10 hours. I'm getting maybe 4-5 hours max. Either mine is defective or the specs are exaggerated. Considering returning it.
record.response_response_text: We're sorry to hear about your experience. This doesn't sound right - you may have received a defective unit. Please contact our support team at support@techstore.com and we'll arrange a replacement. Your satisfaction is our priority!

record.title: Good but not great
record.review_text: The speaker sounds good for the price point. My only complaint is that the Bluetooth range isn't as good as my old speaker - starts cutting out past 20 feet. Otherwise, build quality feels solid and it looks nice on my desk.

errors.msg: No matching product record for product_id=PRD-000001

record.title: Good chair, difficult assembly
record.review_text: The chair itself is comfortable and well-built. BUT the assembly was a nightmare. Instructions were confusing, some screws were mislabeled, and it took 3 hours instead of the advertised 45 minutes. Had to watch YouTube videos to figure it out. Chair is great once assembled though.
record.response_response_text: Thank you for this feedback. We've heard similar comments and are working with the manufacturer to improve the instructions. We now also offer professional assembly for $49 - wish we could have offered that to you!
